author: andyc
msg: 1) When surrogate was kept from single char read, block read
would report one less character read.
2) Now always finishes character read, even if hit buffer
3) Delays report of invalid UTF8 byte sequence on block reads
until next read (unless of course it's the first char).
This lets us return as many valid chars as possible before
*) This new code goes slower and is about the same speed as
the built-in UTF8 decoder in the JDK. Some profiling should
help us get rid of the hotspots and go faster again.

author: jeffreyr
msg: added samples to bin dist. and remove classes from distr

author: jeffreyr
msg: Check for more than one ID/NOTATION validation rule previously done at XMLDTDScanner
